Detailed Description

Base class for all render handlers.

Render handler classes are responsible for the settings of a render, as well as collecting the final image data passed back from the renderer.

See also:
DzRenderer::render(), DzRenderer::customRender(), Dz3DViewport::hardwareRender(), Dz3DViewport::renderThumbnail(), DzPBufferView::hardwareRender(), DzPBufferView::renderThumbnail()

Member Function Documentation

void DzRenderHandler::beginFrame ( int  frame  )  [pure virtual]

Called by the renderer to signal the beginning of the render process for the given frame. In a multi-frame render, this will be called once at the start of each frame rendered.

Parameters:
frame The frame that will be rendered.

Implemented in Dz3DViewRenderHandler, DzImageRenderHandler, and DzViewRenderHandler.

void DzRenderHandler::beginRender (  )  [pure virtual]

Called by the renderer to signal the beginning of a render.

Implemented in DzImageRenderHandler.

void DzRenderHandler::finishFrame (  )  [pure virtual]

Called by the renderer to finalize the current frame - no more data will be sent for this frame.

Implemented in Dz3DViewRenderHandler, DzImageRenderHandler, and DzViewRenderHandler.

void DzRenderHandler::finishRender (  )  [pure virtual]

Called by the renderer to signal the end of the render process.

Implemented in DzImageRenderHandler.
